headline: Buffett's Final Filing: Berkshire Initiates New York Times Stake, Slashes Amazon Position Before CEO Transition
summary: The latest 13F filing from Berkshire Hathaway reveals some of the final position changes made by Warren Buffett as CEO.

raw.headline: Buffett's Final Filing: Berkshire Initiates New York Times Stake, Slashes Amazon Position Before CEO Transition
raw.summary: The latest 13F filing from Berkshire Hathaway reveals some of the final position changes made by Warren Buffett as CEO.

headline: Aon Joins Ferrari Hypersail as Premium Partner
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced that it will serve as the Premium Partner of Ferrari Hypersail, an unprecedented marine initiative dedicated to high-performance sailing.

raw.headline: Aon Joins Ferrari Hypersail as Premium Partner
raw.summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced that it will serve as the Premium Partner of Ferrari Hypersail, an unprecedented marine initiative dedicated to high-performance sailing.

headline: Aon appoints Nick Fraccalvieri to lead global facultative reinsurance unit
summary: Fraccalvieri has more than 25 years of industry experience, with a background in both regional and international leadership roles.
